relatedBlades.title: A Challenger in 2025 Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Cloud-Native Application Platforms
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare views this evaluation as a significant recognition of our strategy to help customers deploy once and automate away infrastructure complexity.
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare's developer platform is a strong option for building serverless applications. It provides robust capabilities for security, scalability, and cost management — freeing developers to focus entirely on building and shipping code rather than constantly re-engineering infrastructure.

- Composable and serverless solutions like Workers, Agents SDK, and Workers AI help organizations build and deploy applications to over 330 (200 for AI inference) globally distributed points of presence.
- Our innovative CPU-based pricing model offers a route to cost-efficiency for AI and event-driven workloads such as agents, ensuring customers are only charged for active compute time.
- Our globally distributed edge network and robust security offerings, including DDoS protection and WAF, position us as a trusted leader in secure, scalable internet infrastructure.

Download the report to learn how Cloudflare is evaluated as a Challenger.
![Magic Quadrant for CloudNative Application Platforms](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/n30s8pT0Y4djUGRTPiUuH/47535338986f17bfd7ecd061aeef1ff9/Figure_1_Magic_Quadrant_for_CloudNative_Application_Platforms.png)

relatedBlades.htmlContent:
Gartner, Magic Quadrant for Cloud-Native Application Platforms, Analyst(s): Tigran Egiazarov, Mukul Saha, Prasanna Lakshmi Narasimha, Date of publication: August 5, 2025

This graphic was published by Gartner, Inc. as part of a larger research document and should be evaluated in the context of the entire document. The Gartner document is available upon request from https://www.cloudflare.com/lp/gartner-magic-quadrant-CNAP-2025/.
